sentences.sContent: The designers, unlike wizards, are non-modal and hence allow you the flexibility to simultaneously work on designing different database objects.
sentences.sContent_eng: The designers, unlike wizards, are non-modal and hence allow you the flexibility to simultaneously work on designing different database objects.
sentences.sCn: 与向导不同的是，设计程序是非模态的，因此允许您灵活地同时设计不同的数据库对象。

phrases.pCn: 模态分析；众数分析；实际分析

words.tran: 形式，形态；程序；物理疗法；主要的感觉

trans.tranOther: modal meanings are concerned with the attitude of the speaker to the hearer or to what is being said
